FileTranslate.document: 通过文件数据来调用接口
FileTranslate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: FileTranslate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SourceType": 1,
    "Source": "zh",
    "Target": "en",
    "DocumentType": "txt",
    "Data": "5L2g5aW944CC"
}
FileTranslate.title: 文件翻译请求调用示例

GetFileTranslate.document: 通过文件数据来调用接口
GetFileTranslate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetFileTranslate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": "100001"
}
GetFileTranslate.title: 文件翻译结果查询调用示例

ImageTranslate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImageTranslate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Target": "en",
    "SessionUuid": "session-00001",
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "Scene": "doc",
    "Source": "zh",
    "Data": "iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAdkAAABPCAYAAACnD7%252FoAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAJ\n......\nCCyAAAAwCQgsgAAAMAkILIAAADAJCCyAAAAwCQgsgAAAMAkILIAAADAFJblX8%252F8oMOWYN6nAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC"
}
ImageTranslate.title: API调用

LanguageDetect.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: LanguageDetect
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Text": "你好",
    "ProjectId": 0
}
LanguageDetect.title: 语种识别调用示例

SpeechTranslate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SpeechTranslate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Target": "en",
    "Seq": 0,
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "SessionUuid": "sid-1516105689129",
    "Source": "zh",
    "AudioFormat": 83886080,
    "Data": "=%2F%2FtQxAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA\n......\nMGCwUAU4UeWgJDOGmC2JgzouqHJQBsZiKUicVTU5UGTZ6mVJYlri5s9geZdCjBnExqtEsaw%2F5rtShQ6UOkolgkGSpWK",
    "IsEnd": 1
}
SpeechTranslate.title: API调用

TextTranslate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: TextTranslate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SourceText": "hello",
    "Source": "en",
    "Target": "zh",
    "ProjectId": 0
}
TextTranslate.title: 文本翻译调用示例

TextTranslateBatch.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: TextTranslateBatch
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SourceTextList": [
        "你好",
        "今天天气怎么样"
    ],
    "Source": "zh",
    "Target": "en",
    "ProjectId": 0
}
TextTranslateBatch.title: 批量文本翻译调用示例

TextTranslateBatch.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tmt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: TextTranslateBatch
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Source": "auto",
    "Target": "en",
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "SourceTextList": [
        "你好啊",
        "这是你的苹果"
    ],
    "TermRepoIDList": [
        "753899732b0611efbb47037fdf41da5a"
    ],
    "SentRepoIDList": [
        ""
    ]
}
TextTranslateBatch.title: 批量文本翻译示例
